DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , multicenter , randomize , double-blind , control study evaluate effectiveness PEER Interactive inform treatment subject primary diagnosis depression comorbidity non-psychotic behavioral disorder versus treatment usual , determined investigator . The primary measurement improvement subject depression self-evaluation questionnaire , Quick Inventory Depressive Symptomatology-Self Report 16 , investigator also collect information clinical global improvement reduction adverse event .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Safety Efficacy PEER Interactive Versus Treatment Usual Subjects With Primary Diagnosis Depression

For experimental group treat physician follow guidance subject 's PEER Interactive Report regard sensitivity on-label medication class medication . The subject follow 6 month initial treatment , patient achieve maximum medical improvement ( MMI ) . The patient see routine basis assessment make interaction evaluate patient 's improvement mental health . The subject also closely evaluated determine experience psychiatric specific adverse event . The investigator allow treat patient accord best medical judgment , may include add change medication , see patient frequently , intervention use sleep aid .
